features: (Luxury material): Made of plexiglass non-glass, shatterproof, bendable, will not be damaged if accidentally dropped on the ground, not a real glass mirror, much safer than regular glass mirror, perfect for your kids and pets to play safely
(Super Thick):Thickness: 0.125", 8"L x 8"W, (1 Pcs 8"x8"), because our thickness is 0.125" thick,the others are only 0.07", so the definition is very high, the image is clear and undistorted

(Easy Installation):Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors,After installation please tear off the protective film on the surface.

(Applicable Scenes):Make your precious baby laugh, explore and interact with its own reflection in our kids wall mirror.unbreakable acrylic mirror for kids is an inexpensive and surefire way to support your little one’s development and cheerful mood.mirror can be used as gym mirrors for home gym, bedroom, closet, door, body mirror, wall,wall-mounted mirrors,workout mirror

(Note): (Note): Before the first use, tear off a layer of protective film if the protective film is not torn off, the mirror surface will be blurred). only clean the mirror with a soft cloth and warm water,please not to touch or wipe the mirror surface with your hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Because the Hook brings you back
reviews.reviewText: Mirrors in the bathroom fog because the front gets hot and sweaty, and the back of the mirror stays cool (usually mounted on the wall). Hang this with the hook in the shower. When you go to shave, rinse the FRONT AND BACK of the mirror. The water temperature heats up BOTH sides, and then it does not fog (for about 5-10 minutes). If it fogs, just take it off the hook and rinse it again. If you do mount it permanently, it just won't work as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave it four stars because of the price, they scratch easy and the hole is bigger than I expected, what do you expect for a few bucks? All in all I would buy it again since I'm using it on my sailboat during an ocean Crossing and I don't want glass on board otherwise I would look for a different product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for babies!
reviews.reviewText: My dtr is 10 months and pulling to stand. These mirrors are not sharp at all and durable as she has banged on them many times. Got a general grab bar to add. Did not use adhesives but just used mirror holders. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got these for our pet bird, because he is absolutely obsessed with mirrors. We've only used one of the four squares so far; and the purchase was totally worth it for that square alone! It has been tossed around on various floor types: carpet, concrete, and it is constantly flipped over on its front and back. It has endured so much, and it still looks amazing and hasn't broken or cracked at all. The back of the mirror is a little scratched from his beak grabbing on to it, but it is super durable and is still going strong. This mirror will last him for a long time! And if it ever breaks or can't possibly be used any more, we already have a backup of 3 more from this order. :) I definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: That's a total lie. First time of use and it's already foggy lens. I had to use my squeegee everyday. So annoying. I bought it because of their description but it is all false advertising. Don't waste your money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay to travel
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and compact for travel. Not fog free -is any shower mirror? One of them was hazy and would not ckear up entirely. Oddly it was the outline of the product label sticker that was afixed outside the plastic sheath that the mirror came in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice mirror. Need to run hot water on it before using it in the shower but after it’s been warmed and gotten wet, it stays fog free for several minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but could be better
reviews.reviewText: Does chip even though advertised as unbreakable
